'''Miso Soup''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Miso Soup is obtainable from [[Shimura Kanbei]] at [[Shimura's]] for 1,250 [[Mora]].

Depending on the quality, Miso Soup restores '''8'''/'''9'''/'''10'''% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates '''210'''/'''260'''/'''300''' HP every 5 seconds for 30 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].

{{Special Dish|Thoma|"Warmth"}}
